title: Mission To Mars | Encore: The Woman Who Put Man on the Moon | 5
description:
Astronauts Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin are preparing to land on the Moon. The whole world is watching live on television. But something is very wrong: Their warning alarms are flashing. There’s only one woman who can fix it: MIT software engineer Margaret Hamilton. 

This episode originally aired on March 14, 2019.
